products.title: Infusion Asc Raspberry Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc raspberry perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

products.title: Perfect Fit Pleated Blind Infusion Asc Raspberry
products.description: Infusion asc perfect fit pleated blinds are manufactured from high quality uk made fabrics. The advanced solar coating on the reverse of the fabric significantly reduces heat and glare entering your room, making them ideal for south facing windows and conservatories. Perfect fit pleated blind infusion asc raspberry available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Infusion Solar Raspberry Neat Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Infusion solar not only brings fresh varied colours to your home but the added benefit of a solar control coating to reduce direct sunlight reducing harmful uv rays, keeping furnishings looking vibrant. A berry-licious shade, raspberry is a strong pink shade, great for creating contrast or even complimenting a bright summery colour theme. Product id: db-nfpl0009 fabric colour: raspberry material: 100% polyester headrail: white neat fit hardware with slide-in clips control type: folding pull down handle, minimum projection from glass to front of handle is 30mm.

products.title: Infusion Solar Raspberry Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Their range of infusion solar pleated blinds is an excellent alternative to a venetian or roller blind. The solar feature means the blind will block sunlight and ultraviolet rays. The infusion solar raspberry pleated skylight blind will transform the look of your home. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. Product id: db-pls0024 fabric colour: raspberry headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.
